value.name: King Charles has cancer. Here’s what we know
value.description: King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer and has started treatment in London. The shock diagnosis comes a week after the 75-year-old British monarch left hospital following a separate procedure for an enlarged prostate.

value.name: King Charles offers touching apology as his cancer diagnosis is announced
value.description: King Charles III has apologised after postponing his upcoming public duties following his cancer diagnosis. It was announced by Buckingham Palace earlier this evening that Charles had been diagnosed with an unspecified form of cancer. The King pulled out of his planned engagements earlier this month to receive treatment for an enlarged prostate.

value.name: King Charles' 'final years' plea and the bitter feud as Prince Harry flies to UK after cancer diagnosis
value.description: Prince Harry is flying back to the UK urgently to see his father King Charles after it was made public that the monarch has been diagnosed with cancer. The Duke of Sussex, who lives in the States with wife Meghan Markle, has been locked in a feud with the Royal Family but is 'clearing his diary' to fly back from his California home to see his dad.
